fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Reckless (2-shot): Use an ability that a Killing Agent can use.
~ Signal Mass Attack (1-shot): Use during the day. Enable all Agent roles to use a factional attack the next night. Agents will be informed of this.
~ Take Charge (0-shot): This ability gains 1 ammo the first time a Town Power, Neutral Killing, or Faction Lead/Head role dies. All Agents are informed of your identity, and your attack is upgraded to Unstoppable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: ~ You have Invincible defense against any form of poison.
